sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>false</active>
        <api_name>global.OneAPIOutputProcessorTemplate</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>OneAPIOutputProcessorTemplate</name>
        <script><![CDATA[// Template script to process response from ONE API call. 
// For every service plan in one_api_service_plan table, there should be a output processor script.

var OneAPIOutputProcessorTemplate = Class.create();
OneAPIOutputProcessorTemplate.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	// Mandatory function in every processor. This method is called after a completed response is received from One API invocation.
	processCompleted: function(oneApiResponse) {
		
	},
	
	// Mandatory function in every processor. This method is called after an error response is received from One API invocation.
	processErrored: function(oneApiResponse) {
		
	},
	
	// Mandatory function in every processor. This method is called if the one api call is cancelled.
	processCancelled: function(oneApiResponse) {
		
	},

    type: 'OneAPIOutputProcessorTemplate'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-27 02:51:09</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1a2e796b53310110a260ddeeff7b1272</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OneAPIOutputProcessorTemplate</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="One API FlowDesigner/IntegrationHub execution environment" source="com.glide.oneapi.fdih">fcc3d1252f221110d8a4d5f62799b6a4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1a2e796b53310110a260ddeeff7b1272</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-02 15:11:06</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>854</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
